position: Software Engineer / Full-Stack (.NET + Angular) with DevOps (AWS)
quote: Strong problem-solver with a passion for clean code, agile collaboration, and continuous learning.

sections.title: Summary
sections.description: Experienced Software Engineer with 8+ years building scalable enterprise and SaaS applications using Python, C#, ASP.NET Core/.NET (Web API, MVC, EF), and Angular. Experienced in real-time data processing, REST API design, database design/migrations, DevOps scripting (PowerShell), containerization (Docker), and IaC (Terraform/Packer) for hybrid AWS + on-prem environments. Comfortable in international agile teams (US clients, Europe collaboration).

items.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Automated XML data feeds to SFTP servers using Python with robust error logging/reporting.
Provisioned and managed hybrid infrastructure (AWS + on-prem) using Terraform and Packer (IaC).
Built enterprise web applications using .NET technologies to improve UX and performance.
Designed/implemented RESTful APIs; executed data migration using Code-First and LINQ.
Developed PowerShell scripts to manage DB/file-streamer policies across build environments.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on UI and custom controls.

items.title: Software Engineer - 1
descriptions: Developed SaaS web applications using Angular and .NET Core for scalability/performance.
Dockerized console apps for job scheduling in Linux containers to streamline deployments.
Handled database development: schema, stored procedures, transactions; performance tuning with T-SQL/PL-SQL.

items.title: Junior Software Developer
items.organization: Launchship IT and Media Pvt Limited
descriptions: Delivered enterprise applications using Microsoft .NET technologies within deadlines.
Developed and maintained UIs and custom controls.
Built modules for 'Academy Front' SaaS for educational institution management.
Implemented RBAC authentication and custom rule-engine validation.
Contributed to SSO across multiple applications.
Dockerized console applications for automated jobs and client integrations.

items.title: Real-time XML data feed automation
descriptions: Automated real-time XML data feed + logging using Python; improved reliability by ~30%.

items.title: Scalable REST APIs for SaaS
descriptions: Developed scalable APIs reducing manual intervention in data flows.

items.title: Hybrid deployment enablement
descriptions: Dockerized multiple apps for hybrid (AWS + on-prem) deployment.

items.title: M.Tech in Power Electronics and Drives (77%)
descriptions: Qualified GATE 2013; received stipend throughout M.Tech.

items.title: B.Tech in Electrical and Electronics Engineering (71%)
Member
descriptions: Participated in soap-making workshops for underprivileged children across local schools.
Built green desks with peers for local schools to support sustainability.

items.title: Member
descriptions: Cricket: represented corporate team in tournaments.

items.title: Snapshot vs typical 2026 expectations (mid-level SWE)
items.organization: Comparison derived from your CV + generic benchmark rubric
descriptions: Education: You have a Master's degree (meets/exceeds common expectation).
Experience: 8+ years (exceeds typical mid-level; aligns with Senior SWE expectations).
Core stack: Strong .NET + Angular + Python + REST APIs (meets/exceeds).
Cloud/DevOps: AWS + Terraform + Docker + Kubernetes exposure (meets/exceeds for many product teams).
Certifications: 1 relevant cert (AWS SAA) — often 1–2 is common; adding CKAD/CKA or Terraform Associate could strengthen DevOps profile.
Languages: English fluent + Swedish beginner (good for EU market; increasing Swedish level helps local roles).
